There is strict anti ragging policies in CMRIT, any one who do these have to answer to the authorities and action will be taken against such people or student.

CMRIT (CMR Institute of Technology) campus is located in Whitefield, Bangalore, in South India's IT corridor. It's a well-connected and accessible location, spread over 8 acres. The campus features a central library, state-of-the-art ICT facilities, seminar halls, auditoriums, and dedicated spaces for placements.

Enrollment takes place after admission is confirmed. Students need to register for their course, submit required documents, and complete the fee payment to finalize enrollment.contact us on info@cmrit.ac.in

Our college provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls with fully furnished rooms, WiFi, mess facility, study halls, and recreational areas. Hostel accommodation is available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Our placement cell actively organizes campus recruitment drives and internships.

The college offers various scholarships based on merit, sports, and socio-economic conditions. Students can apply for government scholarships, fee waivers, and private fellowships through the scholarship office.

Our library houses over 60,000 books, journals, and digital resources. Students can access e-books, research papers, and study materials through the online catalog. Library membership is issued during enrollment.

You can contact the college at 9342900666 or email info@cmrit.ac.in. Our campus is located at 132 AECS Layout ITPL Main Road, Kundalahalli Bangalore 560037, India Office hours are from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Saturday.

The college hosts a variety of events throughout the year including cultural fests, technical fests, seminars, workshops, and guest lectures. Event details are announced on the college website and notice boards.
Our sports department provides facilities for cricket, football, basketball, volleyball, and indoor games. We also have a gym and regularly organize inter-college sports tournaments.
The college canteen serves hygienic and affordable food, snacks, and beverages throughout the day. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options are available at reasonable prices.

The college operates from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Saturday. The administrative office follows the same timings.
Our campus is located at ITPL Main Road, Phase 2, Brookefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560037, India — easily accessible via metro and public transport.
Our campus facilities include WiFi-enabled classrooms, computer labs, library, sports complex, hostels, gymnasium, auditorium, cafeteria, and canteen.

The nearest bus stop to CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) is in front of the college itself. The nearest metro station is Sitarampalya Metro Station, located approximately 1 km from the college. Both are easily accessible by walking or local transport.
The principal of CMR Institute of Technology (CMRIT) is Dr. Sanjay Jain, and the vice-principal is Dr. B. Narasimha Murthy.
